workshoptitle: AI Services: Introduction to OCI Vision

tutorials.title: Introduction: OCI Vision
tutorials.description: Learn about the features provided by Vision services

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Learn about AI at the Edge with Oracle Edge Cloud
tutorials.description: Learn you can deploy AI workloads at the Edge with Compute Cloud@Customer and Roving Edge Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a GPU instance using the Roving Edge Device
tutorials.description: Learn how to login, define and deploy a GPU instance on the Roving Edge Infrastructure

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Pre-requisites for deploying a RagBot
tutorials.description: Learn how to download and install AI models and dependencies on your Roving Edge Device

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Creating the directory and installing the application
tutorials.description: Learn how to run the RagBot program

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Accessing the RagBot and querying the application
tutorials.description: Learn how to login to your RagBot application and access it at the edge

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
